medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began two weeks after the iodine scan, with coughing and chest tightness. End-expiratory wheezing was noted on auscultation. Symptoms improved under inhaled corticosteroids and beta-2 agonists.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of papillary thyroid carcinoma, Hashimoto thyroiditis, and previous hemithyroidectomy.
medical_history.social_history: Skin testing revealed hypersensitivity to dog. Recommendations were to avoid allergens.
